title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the search results are not being selected.
OB: Double click on the search result. Observe: The first match is not selected.
EB: The search result should be selected when double clicked.
SR:
1. Open the external jar file.
2. Search for references to the specific field.
3. Double click on the search result.
4. Verify that the search result is selected.
